long_description: Whether you're training or competing in a triathlon, the Sugoi Turbo Jammer Swimsuit offers a sleek, supportive fit to help you hit your personal best. Polyester fabric has built-in stretch for excellent comfort and support; fabric is also highly resistant to chlorine degradation. Flatlock seams reduce abrasion and ensure a streamlined look and feel. Minimalist liner offers added support and comfort without restricting movement. Stretch drawstring and elastic waistband help keep the Sugoi Turbo Jammer Swimsuit securely in place.
short_description: Whether you're training or competing in a triathlon, the Sugoi Turbo Jammer Swimsuit offers a sleek, supportive fit to help you hit your personal best.
